original_text: Amaziah was twenty and five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned twenty and nine years in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Jehoaddan of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 아마샤가 왕위에 오를 때에 나이가 이십오 세라 예루살렘에서 이십구 년 동안 다스리니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 여호앗단이요 예루살렘 사람이더라

sentences.original_text: Amaziah was twenty and five years old
and he reigned twenty and nine years in Jerusalem
And his mother's name was Jehoaddan
